name: Musical Magic Master
description:
Made for Mini Jam 107: Music²

A platformer with musical encounters. If you can play their song then you get their instrument, giving you various platforming abilities. 

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Escape - Pause
  • Left Click - Find out in game
  • Left Shift - Find out in game

Note for Mini Jam: First time using this site so I overwrote the original submit on accident with a hard mode fix.
